full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GTER GSAR GU RU DRAG DMAR BKA' SDOD MGON PO YAB YUM SDE BRGYAD DANG BCAS PA'I GTOR CHOG KUN BZANG MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B 'GA' ZHIG GSAR DU BSGRIGS PA'I GTOR CHOG KUN MCHOD SPRIN RGYA MTSO ZHES PA 'DI NI, LAM 'DI'I RNAL 'BYOR LA BRTZON PA'I RIG PA 'DZIN PA PADMA RGYAL PO RTZAL GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,
